publicationStmt.publisher: Department of English, University of New Mexico

head.title: BLAKE/AN ILLUSTRATED QUARTERLY INDEX TO VOLUME 15

div1.byline: Compiled by Thomas L. Minnick, The Ohio State University
div1.q: The first number in the reference is the whole number of the issue (nos. 57-60); the second is the page within the issue. Thus, 59:143 signifies whole number 59, page 143.
